__e: These are good soldiers, but they were the wrong soldiers, and now three of them are dead because of it.
No, serious! Look at those soldiers and their weapons.
No, no, wait... that one, with the soldier and the lady.
No more than it was wrong to save you from those soldier things.
It's so tough to be married to a soldier.
I was just kidding. I know.
They are the best soldiers in the world.
I need a soldier That ain't scared to stand up for me
There's a soldier who's like that.
Were not you two soldiers where you came?
You know, I think everything has been said by the soldiers who were there.
And the men we have slain?
I talked to an old woman who said that her grandson saw soldiers yesterday.
I don't understand. What is it?
Still a lot of soldiers around Better get inside
Take a few people and burn down this fiendish nest.
It takes men to hit the town!
But blowing up his own soldiers, I find that very difficult to believe.
It takes men to hit the town!
Still a lot of soldiers around Better get inside
He will be just one of many soldiers in my army.
They don't look like soldiers to me, either.
How long do you expect the world to believe those aren't your soldiers?
It was clear that they were just soldiers.
